title: What song gets instantly stuck in your head? Did I cause one to stick there? - Quora

response.answer_text: Right now it’s dance of the clairvoyants ⚡️ Quite a few years back I had the jingle for hotwire.com in my head all day it drove me insane …..it’s a travel website. I was stuck in a town where we just moved, I didn’t have many friends, way up close to Churchill, literally the end of the road in Manitoba, it’s funny I remember listening to the soundtrack for Into the wild as we left town and thought how fitting ❤️
